content: That's a great idea! I think pairing the pasta-making kit with a cookbook or cooking class would be a wonderful way to enhance the gift and show my mom that I'm invested in her learning and enjoyment. I'll definitely look into those options. Do you think it would be a good idea to include a personalized note or message with the gift, expressing my excitement for her to try out this new hobby and maybe even sharing a favorite pasta-related memory we've shared together?
